message: Accept this and we can split the money evenly. No need to negotiate further.
You're trying to get the better deal, now it's my turn to take a bigger share!
Meet me in the middle, Bob. This is a fair split considering the inflation.
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not falling for it. I'll meet you in the middle, but I want a slight edge.

I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a middle ground. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to go any higher.
